org.ambraproject.rhino.cache

Class MemcacheProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ambraproject.rhino.cache.MemcacheProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.ambraproject.service.cache.Cache

    public class MemcacheProvider
extends Object
implements org.ambraproject.service.cache.Cache
    Implementation of Cache that uses memcached as its store.

    Note that one limitation of this implementation is that values must implement Serializable. I didn't want to add this constraint to Cache, since it already has implementations that work with non-Serializable objects. If non-Serializable objects are added to this cache, the operation will fail at runtime.
